name: twitch_bulk_search
description: Search multiple terms on Twitch in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling twitch_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="search-result"] article, [class*="tw-tower"] > div, article'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 5); i++) { const el = cards[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('h3, [class*="channel-name"], [data-a-target="preview-card-channel-link"]'); const gameEl = el.querySelector('[data-a-target="preview-card-game-link"], [class*="game"]'); const viewersEl = el.querySelector('[class*="viewer"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href]'); const liveEl = el.querySelector('[class*="live"]'); results.push({ name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', game: gameEl ? gameEl.textContent.trim() : '', viewers: viewersEl ? viewersEl.textContent.trim() : '', is_live: !!liveEl, url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('term') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
